Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Today is my day to tend the field at
Nack's place.<sp:0:4:0>The cultivation of the <clr:0000>sun pumpkins<clr:ffff> is
going well. You should go have a look!
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired_01>It's past time for my veggies to sleep.
I'll be joining them soon in dreamland.<sp:0:4:0>Are you lodging at <clr:0000>Ton Pu Inn<clr:ffff> tonight?<sp:0:4:0>The soft bed there seems nice. I'd like
to give it a try one day.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Don't think I've seen you around. Are you
a traveler? Then welcome to <clr:0000>Hateno
Village<clr:ffff>. I'm <clr:0000>Reede<clr:ffff>, the mayor.<sp:0:4:0>And yes, before you say it, I know about
all these tacky sculptures everywhere you
look around here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0900>What an eyesore! They've spoiling the
rustic atmosphere Hateno Village is
known for.<sp:0:4:0>And I know who's behind itâ€”the <clr:0000>designer<clr:ffff>
at <clr:0000>Ventest Clothing<clr:ffff>, that clothes shop
near the village entrance.<sp:0:4:0>I was just thinking about going and giving
her a piece of my mind.<sp:0:4:0>Sorry to say, but if you need something
from me, you'll have to come see me
again later.
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The way the village looks now isn't as bad
as I thought at first. I'm getting used to it.<sp:0:4:0>I'm working with Cece to make sure our
village not only survives but thrives!
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I'm about to go to <clr:0000>Ventest Clothing<clr:ffff>, the
clothes shop near the village entrance.<sp:0:4:0>Sorry to say, but if you need something
from me, you'll have to come see me
again later.
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>How did things get to this point?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Well, there's no way I'm giving up my
position as mayor without a fight. Mark
my words, I'll win that election!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Especially with <clr:0000>Hateno cheese<clr:ffff> on my
side. How can the villagers say no?!
Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>The <clr:0000>sun pumpkins<clr:ffff> are looking healthy,
thanks to all your help.<sp:0:4:0>I don't think we have anything to worry
about from those monsters now that
you've given them a good thrashing.<sp:0:4:0>I don't know how I can thank you enough.<sp:0:4:0>If you pass this way again on your travels,
come visit us anytime you like.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Everyone in the village will be glad to
see you.
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:TalkPositive_01>The village mayor election has gotten
closer than I'm comfortable with.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>But this Hateno cheese is a perfect new
signature food for the village. With this on
my side, I can't lose.<sp:0:4:0>Thanks for helping me out so much with...
everything, really.
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Well, well. Bad weather aside, it's good to
see you.
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You watched over those <clr:0000>sun pumpkins<clr:ffff>
until they grew, and now it's my turn to
keep them safe.<sp:0:4:0>They're already a big seller at the <clr:0000>general
store<clr:ffff>, which is a good sign for all of us!
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I held on to my seat as mayor, but that
doesn't mean I can rest easy. Far from it!<sp:0:4:0>It's still odd walking around the village
I grew up in and seeing it look like this...<sp:0:4:0>But it's not as bad as I thought at first.
I'm getting used to it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm going to keep working with Cece to
make sure our village not only survives
but thrives!
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS_01>Huh? <sp:5:0:0>Why are you in my house?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>My door is always open, of course.<sp:0:4:0>But there are more interesting things to
see in Hateno Village. Go tour the fields
and farms outside!
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The homegrown Hateno vegetables we
raised are sold at the <clr:0000>general store<clr:ffff> now.<sp:0:4:0>Have you thought about taking some
with you on your travels?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Chat_01>Those <clr:0000>sun pumpkins<clr:ffff> grew without a hitch,
which is a good sign for all of us here!
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>You're here again?<sp:0:4:0>Not that I mind, but there's nothing that
interesting here. <sp:5:0:0>You should go out and
see the town's fields and pastures!
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>The <clr:0000>sun pumpkins<clr:ffff> are getting nice and
ripe, thanks to all your help.<sp:0:4:0>I don't think we have anything to worry
about from those monsters now that
you've given them a good thrashing.<sp:0:4:0>I don't know how I can thank you enough.<sp:0:4:0>If you pass this way again on your travels,
come visit us anytime you like.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:LaughS_00>Everyone in the village will be glad to
see you.
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Tired_01>Both veggies and people need their sleep.
I'm thinking of hitting the hay myself.<sp:0:4:0>Are you lodging at <clr:0000>Ton Pu Inn<clr:ffff> tonight?<sp:0:4:0>The soft bed there seems nice. I'd like
to give it a try one day.
